item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Buzzy:

Point is, we had the opportunity to be beta testers for a company that’s not completely unknown, or just getting on their feet, and a lot of us insulted the person who offered us a job lol.

Who cares? I really doubt that it was Jade Raymond. If it wasn’t her, then it wasn’t worth our time.

item.title: Ubisoft MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:33, topic:167708”][quote author=Buzzy link=topic=227144.msg1953889#msg1953889 date=1198658330]
I finally just quit runescape at last after that wild and trade change, I can’t handle anymore changes from when the game was amazing (when I started, during beta of rs2). The wild was the final straw. I just got a social life, and I must admit it’s a lot more fun than a virtual fun, that space I thought was hunger turned out to be loneliness. I won’t bother playing, I think that what I’ve gotten from online gaming at this point is about as much as I’ll ever get, so why go back to it?
[/quote]What are you talking about? Quit MITB then…

I wonder whose Ub? The creator must have hated him/her to create a company under the name Ub-is-soft[/quote]
I don’t think I’m going to stop coming to MITB anytime soon. I’ve been around the rs-cheating community since rs2’s beta, I used to be on Sythe, Fagex, rs-tools.prv.pl, and Taios and Kaitnieks site all the time. I remember when I first started coming here, I practically lived in the 3rd party software and the tuts page. I remember seeing Moparscape actually running on real rs, pking with it, and being absolutely fucking mind blown at how pissed andrew and paul must have been at the site of it. I remember making tons of tuts and reading them, hell, without this site, I probably wouldn’t be torrenting right now. Ron, Mr. Chris, ilyaostr9(pretty sure that’s how it was spelled (io9’s old acc)), silver lining, Friday the 13th, Moparisthebest, Starblaster, Nick (from australia or new Zealand) Kaitnieks, Juanito, Taios, Silabsoft, Frank_, and Xerxes are my fucking heroes. I’ll never stop coming, even when this site is completely over run with little MoparScapers and none of my heroes ever make any appearances, I’ll still be here, this scene has been my side life for the past 4 years, how the hell do you give that up?

Read full topic

@Buzzy wrote:

I finally just quit runescape at last after that wild and trade change, I can’t handle anymore changes from when the game was amazing (when I started, during beta of rs2). The wild was the final straw. I just got a social life, and I must admit it’s a lot more fun than a virtual fun, that space I thought was hunger turned out to be loneliness. I won’t bother playing, I think that what I’ve gotten from online gaming at this point is about as much as I’ll ever get, so why go back to it?
